mapper.insert: insert into VOLTAGE (STATIONID, DATATIME, `DATA`, TRANSTYPE, MESSAGETYPE, RECVDATATIME, `STATE`) values (#{stationid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{datatime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{data,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{transtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{messagetype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{recvdatatime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into VOLTAGE
STATIONID,
DATATIME,
`DATA`,
TRANSTYPE,
MESSAGETYPE,
RECVDATATIME,
`STATE`,
#{stationid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{datatime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{data,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{transtype,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{messagetype,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{recvdatatime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

insert into VOLTAGE (STATIONID,DATATIME,DATA,TRANSTYPE,MESSAGETYPE,RECVDATATIME,STATE)
( select #{item.stationid}, to_date(#{item.datatime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), #{item.data}, #{item.transtype}, #{item.messagetype}, to_date(#{item.recvdatatime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), #{item.state} from dual )
mapper.select:
select t.STATIONID, t.DATATIME, t.DATA, t.TRANSTYPE, t.MESSAGETYPE, t.RECVDATATIME， t.STATE from VOLTAGE t where 1=1
and STATIONID = #{stationid}
and DATATIME = to_date(#{datatime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
and DATATIME >= to_date(#{strttime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
and to_date(#{endtime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') >= DATATIME
order by t.STATIONID
